snippet.title: Tricky Super Mario Bros. U - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Been a while, hasn’t it?

Tricky Super Mario Bros. U is a mod of NSMBU that aims to take the familiar and twist it into something new and more complex for super players looking for a new challenge. Get your plumber shoes ready, because Bowser and his Koopa Troop won’t be going down so easily this time.

The demo will contain:
- 8 newly revamped levels (all of World 1)
- 5 newly revamped challenges
- New music by brickblock369 and Limeopolis
- Altered backgrounds and tilesets by Rimea, WillyMaker, and myself
- And much more!

Trailer theme is “Boss 2” from DK: Jungle Climber. 
Logo and thumbnail by Rimea.

Discord: https://discord.gg/U9WkRVSzzr

If you haven't already, be sure to also check out the NSMBU Modding Direct for a look at more upcoming mods and a deeper dive into Tricky Super Mario Bros. U: https://youtu.be/u2-FXKWj1Cs
